content: विधातृ {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A maker, creator; <ls>Ku. 7. 36.</ls> {@--2@} The creator, <ab>N.</ab> of Brahman; विधाता भद्रं नो वितरतु मनोज्ञाय विधये <ls>Māl. 6. 7</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 35</ls>, <ls n="R.">6. 11</ls>; <ls n="R.">7. 25</ls>. {@--3@} A granter, giver, bestower; <ls>Ku. 1. 57.</ls> {@--4@} Fate, destiny; <ls>H. 1. 40.</ls> {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viśvakarman. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Kāma, the god of love. {@--7@} Spirituous liquor.
